description: A smaller corridor branches off to the east, illuminated by luminescent moss-covered globes suspended from the ceiling.  The portion of the mural displayed in the main hall depicts the dwarven and giantman camps on separate portions of Sunfist after nightfall, their campfires highlighted by glittering quartz shards.
title: [Stone Edifice, Hallway]
location: the tunnels and caverns of Zul Logoth
